title: After The Full Moon
description:
Description :
        Ah Shui, who’s having a vacation overseas, got scammed of all his money. In order to get the money to buy a plane ticket home, the moneyless Ah Shui can only take on a part time food delivery guy at a Chinese restaurant. Just when he can finally go home after delivering for the last time, he got dragged into endless conspiracies because of this food delivery…
what’s even terrifying, he seems to have become a monster that chooses to swallow people…
